page.title: 17LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: {YOUTH CLUB}: Parkwood Youth Club starts at 3.30 and finishes at 6.30. On Saturdays it starts at 9.30 and goes on until 12.30. It costs 10p to enter and some of the games you can play are darts and snooker. { {GUIDES}: On Fridays there is a guides meeting and there are five patrols. These are called Kingfisher, Swallow, Robin, Blue Tit, and Chaffinch. The meetings are held in the Infant's School hall and end at 8.30. { {THE LIBRARY}: Here there are many books. You must become a member and have a card which has your name on it and proves your membership. There are tables where children and adults can read and study.
